sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Pie id="my-chart-id" :options="chartOptions" :data="chartData" />
</template>

<script>
import { Pie } from "vue-chartjs";
import {
  Chart as ChartJS,
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  PieController,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale,
} from "chart.js";

ChartJS.register(
  Title,
  Tooltip,
  Legend,
  PieController,
  CategoryScale,
  LinearScale
);

export default {
  name: "PieChart",
  components: { Pie },
  data() {
    return {
      chartData: {
        labels: ["Red", "Blue", "Yellow"],
        datasets: [
          {
            data: [40, 20, 12],
            backgroundColor: ["#FF6384", "#36A2EB", "#FFCE56"],
            hoverBackgroundColor: ["#FF6384", "#36A2EB", "#FFCE56"],
          },
        ],
      },
      chartOptions: {
        responsive: true,
      },
    };
  },
};
</script>
